title: Mortimeriados The lamentable ciuell vvarres of Edward the second and the barrons.
author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for Humfry Lownes, and are to be solde at his shop at the west end of Paules Church,
notes: A variant of the edition with ".. printed .. for Mathew Lownes .. 1596." in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
